snippet.title: Everything About Megapatch II
snippet.description:
Everything you need to know about upcoming MegaPatch II in SCP: Secret Laboratory. Don't forget to subscribe!

DISCLAIMER: Contains flickering scenes and a dangerous level of dead memes.

Play the game for free: https://store.steampowered.com/app/700330/SCP_Secret_Laboratory/
Webpage: http://scpslgame.com
Related post: https://steamcommunity.com/games/700330/announcements/detail/1612769067170829480

0:05 - Introduction
0:40 - Explanations
1:29 - New SCP items
         ^ 1:41 - SCP-018 "Super Ball" (http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-018)
         ^ 2:11 - SCP-500 "Panacea" (http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-500)
         ^ 2:36 - SCP-207 "Cola Bottles" (http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-207)
         ^ 3:04 - SCP-268 "Cap of Neglect" (http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-268)
3:35 - More lockers
4:00 - Treatment system
4:31 - Weapon changes
5:36 - Ending

Music used:
-SCP:SL OST - Melancholy (Extended ver)

Voices:
-Vess - Art Director

The video is licensed under the CC-BY-SA 4.0 license - https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
